articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: General Motors (GM.N) said on Thursday it had made a counter offer to the United Auto Workers (UAW) in a bid to end a strike by the union against the U.S. automaker.
articles.title: GM makes counteroffer to UAW in strike talks

articles.author: Saqib Ahmed
articles.description: Surging U.S. real yields are aiding the dollar's rebound, rewarding bullish investors while making bears think twice before betting against the buck.
articles.title: US dollar's rally supercharged by soaring real yields on Treasuries

articles.author: Ananya Mariam Rajesh, Helen Reid
articles.description: Sandal company Birkenstock needs to sell more clogs and boots and boost sales from its own website and boutiques to attract new shoppers amid a cost of living crisis, investors and analysts said before it lists on the New York Stock Exchange next week.
articles.title: Focus: Birkenstock the latest shoe IPO to drop in a tough market

articles.author: Chibuike Oguh
articles.description: Shares of Rivian Automotive Inc (RIVN.O) fell by more than 20% on Thursday, after the electric vehicle maker unveiled plans to issue $1.5 billion worth of convertible green bonds.
articles.title: EV maker Rivian shares tumble after launch of $1.5 bln convertible bond offering

articles.author: Tom Polansek
articles.description: Chicken prices at U.S. grocery stores have hit record highs and should stay elevated as Tyson Foods and other companies dial back poultry production to boost margins while inflation-weary shoppers buy chicken instead of beef and pork.
articles.title: Record chicken prices squeeze US shoppers, benefit Tyson Foods

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits rose moderately last week, while layoffs declined in September, pointing to still-tight labor market conditions.
articles.title: U.S. weekly jobless claims rise moderately

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Hyundai Motor Co (005380.KS) said on Thursday it has decided to adopt Tesla Inc's (TSLA.O) electric vehicle (EV) charging technology in the United States and Canada.
articles.title: Hyundai Motor to adopt Tesla EV-charging standard from 2024 in US

articles.author: Mica Rosenberg, Nandita Bose
articles.description: President Joe Biden's administration said on Thursday it will add sections to a border wall to stave off record migrant crossings from Mexico, a reversal that embraces a signature policy of former President Donald Trump.
articles.title: In reversal Biden to build more US border wall, Trump demands apology

articles.author: Idrees Ali, Huseyin Hayatsever
articles.description: The United States on Thursday shot down an armed Turkish drone that was operating near its troops in Syria, U.S. officials said, the first time Washington has brought down an aircraft of NATO ally Turkey.
articles.title: US jet shoots down Turkish drone in Syria, officials say

articles.author: Sam Tobin
articles.description: A man who was arrested with a loaded crossbow at Windsor Castle saying he wanted to kill Queen Elizabeth was detained for nine years on Thursday after admitting an offence under the Treason Act and making threats against the late monarch.
articles.title: Crossbow man detained for nine years over treason threat to kill Queen Elizabeth
